name: MetastaticCancer
title: Metastatic Cancer
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a metastatic cancer diagnosis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with secondary cancer diagnoses.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
